songs.title: A Quarter Century
songs.lyrics:
Over the course of a quarter century,

the Bahá'í world underwent a transformation that endowed it with an undreamed-of capacity, undreamed-of capacity to learn, to grow, and to serve humanity (x2)

But, however bright were the achievements of this period,

they must be eclipsed by (x2)

what is to come.
songs.author: Universal House of Justice

songs.title: Armed with the Power of Thy Name
songs.lyrics:
Armed with the power of Thy name
Nothing can ever hurt me no, nothing can ever hurt me (x2)

And with Thy love in my heart, all the world's afflictions can in no wise alarm me (x2)

Ya Bahá'u'l-Abhá (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Blessed is the Spot
songs.lyrics:
Blessed is the spot, and the house, and the place,

And the city, and the heart, and the mountain

And the refuge, and the cave, and the valley, and the land,

And the sea, and the island, and the meadow

Where mention of God hath been made,

And His praise glorified.
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Faith is the Magnet
songs.lyrics:
Faith, faith is the magnet
Which draws the confirmation of the Merciful One (x2)

Service is the magnet which attracts the heavenly strength, the heavenly strength.

Faith, faith is the magnet
Which draws the confirmation of the Merciful One

I hope thou wilt attain both (x4)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: God is Sufficient Unto Me
songs.lyrics:
God is sufficient unto me
He verily
Is the All-sufficing!
In Him let the trusting trust.
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: He is the Compassionate
songs.lyrics:
He is the Compassionate, the All-Bountiful!
O God, my God!
O God, my God!

 Thou seest me, Thou knowest me;
Thou art my Haven
And my Refuge
And my Refuge

None have I sought nor any will I seek
No path have I trodden nor any will I tread
But the path of Thy love (but the path of Thy love!) (x2)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: I Beseech Thee
songs.lyrics:
I beseech Thee (x2)

To make my prayer a fire
That will burn away (will burn away)
The veils that have shut me out

From Thy beauty (x2)

And the light that we lead me to the Ocean of Thy Presence (x2)

Thy Presence (x4)

Alláh-u-Abhá (x12)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: If Thou Lovest Me
songs.lyrics:
If thou lovest Me turn away from thyself; if thou seekest My pleasure regard not thine own (x2)

That thou (that thou) mayest die in Me and I may eternally live in thee (x2)

O Son of Man (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Immensity of Space
songs.lyrics:
Wert thou to speed through
The immensity of space

And traverse
The expanse of heaven

Yet thou wouldst find no rest
Save in submission to Our command

And humbleness
Before Our Face
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: In the Love I Bear to Thee
songs.lyrics:
In the love I bear to Thee, O my Lord,
My heart longeth for Thee
With a longing such as no heart hath known (x2)

Here am I (here am I) (x2)

With my body between Thy hands
And my spirit before Thy face

In the love I bear to Thee

In the love, in the love I bear (x6)

In the love, in the love, In the love
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Kindle the fire of love
songs.lyrics:
Kindle the fire of love
And burn away all things
Then, set thy foot
Into the land of the lovers

In French:
"  Allume le feu de l'amour
  &nbspEt brûle toute chose
  &nbspPuis, fais un pas
  &nbspDans le pays des amants "
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Looking ahead on this path
songs.lyrics:
Looking ahead on this path
Might we not perceive Bahá'u'lláh Himself,
The reins of humanity's affairs in one hand (x2)

His other beckoning all (beckoning all) (x2)
To hasten (to hasten) (x2)
songs.author: Universal House of Justice

songs.title: Lord Pitiful are we
songs.lyrics:
Lord! Pitiful are we, grant us Thy favor
Poor, bestow upon us a share from the ocean of Thy wealth
Needy, do Thou satisfy us

Abased, give us Thy glory (x2)

The fowls of the air and the beasts of the field receive their meat each day from Thee
And all beings partake of Thy care and loving-kindness.
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Love in the Human World
songs.lyrics:
Love in the human world is a ray of the love of God (x2)

And a reflection of the grace of His bounty, of His bounty (x2)

Were it not for the love of God, no real connection could exist (between human hearts) (x4)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Love is not of the Body
songs.lyrics:
Love is not of the body but completely of the soul, the soul (x4)

And those souls whose inner being is lit by the love of God, by the love of God
Are even as spreading rays of light, by the love of God, by the love of God

Love is not of the body but completely of the soul, the soul (x4)

For true love, real love, is the love for God (x4)
(Love is not of the body but completely of the soul, the soul)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Make my Prayer / O Man of Two Visions
songs.lyrics:
Make my prayer (Make my prayer)
O my Lord (O my Lord)
A fountain of living waters
Whereby (whereby)
I may live (I may live)
As long as Thy sovereignty endureth

And may make mention of Thee
In every world of Thy worlds (of Thy worlds)
Of Thy worlds (of Thy worlds) (x2)

Close one eye and open the other (x4)
Close one to the world and all that is therein (x4)
And open the other to the hallowed beauty of the Beloved (of the Beloved) (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: May this Boundless Love
songs.lyrics:
May this boundless love
So fill your hearts and minds
That sadness may find no room to enter
And may you with joyful hearts
Soar like birds
Into the Divine Radiance
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: No One but Thee
songs.lyrics:
O my God
There is no one but Thee
To allay the anguish of my soul, ooh
Thou art my highest aspiration
Oh my God, Oh my God Oooh

My heart is wedded to none save Thee
And such as Thou dost love
I solemnly declare that my life and death are both for Thee
Oooh there are for You

My heart is wedded to none save Thee
And such as Thou dost love
I solemnly declare that my life and death are both for Thee
Oooh there are for You
There are for You (for You)

O my God
There is no one but Thee
To allay the anguish of my soul, ooh
Thou art my highest aspiration
Oh my God, Oh my God Oooh
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: O Befriended Stranger
songs.lyrics:
O Befriended Stranger!

The candle of thine heart is lighted by the hand of My power
Quench it not with the contrary winds of self, of self and passion

The healer of all thine ills is remembrance of Me

Forget it not (x3)

Make My love thy treasure and cherish it even as thy very sight and life

O Befriended Stranger!
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: O God Guide Me
songs.lyrics:
O God, guide me, protect me,

Illumine the lamp of my heart and make of me a brilliant star.

Thou art the Mighty and the Powerful.
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: O Son of Spirit
songs.lyrics:
O Son of Spirit! (x2)

Possess a pure,
Kindly,
And radiant heart.

That thine may be,
A Sovereignty,
Ancient, Imperishable, Everlasting (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Prayer for Parents
songs.lyrics:
O Lord! In this Most Great (Most Great)
O Lord! In this Most Great Dispensation

Thou dost accept the intercession
Of children in behalf of their parents
In behalf of their parents (x2)

Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, accept the request of
Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, this Thy servant

Submerge his father in the ocean of Thy grace (x2)

Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, accept the request of 
Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, this Thy servant

This son hath arisen to render Thee service and is exerting effort at all times in the pathway of Thy love

Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, accept the request of
Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, this Thy servant

Submerge his father in the ocean of Thy grace (x2)

Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, accept the request of
Therefore, O Thou kind Lord, this Thy servant
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Pass By
songs.lyrics:
Pass by whatever exists in this world and find me (find me)

I am the Sun of Perception and the Ocean of Science.

I revive the withered ones and quicken the dead

I am that Light which illumines the path of Insight.

I am the Falcon of the Hand of the Almighty

I bear healing in My wings and teach the knowledge of soaring (x2)

To the Heaven of Truth.
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Raised Up
songs.lyrics:
The enkindled souls
Being raised up
Through the processes of the Plan
Raised up, raised up (x2)

Their efforts advance to the alternating rhythm of action and reflection
Setbacks leave them unfazed
Unfazed, raised up (x2)

They champion rationality and science as essential for human progress (x2)
For human progress (x3)

There are clear about what they have learned and what they still need to learn
They see the power that true religion possesses to transform hearts and overcome distrust
Raised up, raised up
songs.author: Universal House of Justice

songs.title: Religion of God
songs.lyrics:
The religion of God is for love
And unity (unity)
The religion of God is for love
And unity (unity)

Make it not the cause of enmity or dissension (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Remember at all Times
songs.lyrics:
Remember at all times and in all places

That God is faithful and do not doubt this.

Be patient even though great calamities may come upon thee (x2)

Yet, Fear not! Fear not!
Be firm in the path of thy Lord;

As a mountain unmoved, un-changing in thy steadfastness (x4)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Remember my Days
songs.lyrics:
Remember my Days during thy days, and My distress and banishment in this remote prison (x2)

And be thou so steadfast in My love that thy heart (thy heart) shall not waver
Even if the swords of the enemies rain blows upon thee (upon thee)

And all the heavens and the earth arise against thee (against thee) (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Remover of Difficulties
songs.lyrics: Is there any Remover of difficulties save God? Say: Praised be God! He is God! All are His servants, and all abide by His bidding! (x3)
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Say God Sufficeth
songs.lyrics:
Say God sufficeth all things above all things,
And nothing in the heavens or the earth but God sufficeth (x3)

Verily He is in Himself
the Knower, the Sustainer, the Omnipotent

Say God sufficeth (x4)
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Songs of the Prophets
songs.lyrics:
Noah, Abraham, Krishna,
Moses, Zoroaster, Buddha,
Jesus Christ and Muhammed
The Bab and Baha'u'llah.

They are the waves of one Sea,
They are birds of one Tree (singing one song),
They are lamps of one light,
Come and be their lovers,
Be lovers, be lovers
Be lovers of light.

songs.title: The Gate of God
songs.lyrics:
O thou who art the first to believe in Me! (x4)
Eighteen souls must, of their own accord, accept Me, accept Me
and recognise the truth (the truth), the truth of My Revelation. (x2)

Verily I say, I am the Báb, Verily I say, I am the Gate of God (x4)

Eighteen souls must, of their own accord, accept Me, accept Me
Verily I say, I am the Báb, Verily I say, I am the Gate of God (x2)

Verily I say, I am the Báb, Verily I say, I am the Gate of God(x2)
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Thy Heart is My Home
songs.lyrics:
O son of Being!
Thy heart is My home

O son of Being!
Sanctify it (sanctify it) for My descent

Thy spirit is My place of revelation
Cleanse it for My manifestation (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Thou Indeed Hast Power
songs.lyrics:
O my God! I ask Thee, by Thy most glorious Name, to aid me in that which will cause

The affairs of Thy servants to prosper, and Thy cities to flourish.

Thou, indeed, hast power over all things!
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Thou Seest
songs.lyrics:
Thou seest
My weakness
Lowliness
And humility
Before Thy
They Creatures
Nevertheless
I have trusted in Thee and have arisen in the promotion of Thy teachings (x2)

Among Thy strong servants, relying on Thy power and might (x2)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Unite and Bind
songs.lyrics:
Unite and bind together the hearts (x2)

Join in accord all the souls (x2)

Oh Lord! Make these faces radiant

Through the light of Thy oneness
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Unite the Hearts
songs.lyrics:
O my God! O my God! Unite the hearts of Thy servants,
and reveal to them Thy great purpose. (x3)

May they follow Thy commandments and abide in Thy law.

Help them, O God, in their endeavor,
and grant them strength to serve Thee.
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: When a Drop Draws Help
songs.lyrics:
When a drop draws help from the ocean
It is an ocean in itself, it is an ocean in itself

And a little seed, through the outpouring of rain
The favour of the sun and the soul-refreshing breeze will
Become a tree, will become a tree

With the utmost freshness, full of leaves, blossoms and fruits
Therefore, do not consider thy merit or thy capacity
But rely upon (rely upon, rely upon) the infinite bounty
And trust and trust and trust (x3)
To His Highness the Almighty
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Where there is Love
songs.lyrics:
Where there is love (x2)

Nothing is too much trouble (x2)

And there is always time, time, time (x3)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Veiled
songs.lyrics:
O son of Man!

Veiled in My immemorial being
And in the ancient eternity of My essence (x2)

I knew My love for thee
Therefore, I created thee
Have engraved on thee Mine image
And revealed to thee My beauty
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Verily I say, this is the Day
songs.lyrics:
Verily I say, this is the Day
In which mankind can behold the Face (x2)

And hear the Voice (and hear the voice)
Of the Promised One (of the Promised One) (x4)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Whither
songs.lyrics:
Whither shall I turn, whiter shall I turn
Powerless as I am to discover
Any other way, any other way
Except the way Thou didst set (x2)

All the atoms of the earth proclaim Thee to be God, and testify that there is none other God besides Thee (x2)

So whither (whither), whither shall I turn, O my God? (x2)

Powerless as I am (I am), powerless as I am (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Allume le feu de l'amour
songs.lyrics:
Allume le feu de l'amour
Et brûle toute chose
Puis, fais un pas
Dans le pays des amants

En anglais:
«  Kindle the fire of love
    And burn away all things
    Then, set thy foot
    Into the land of the lovers »
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Dis Dieu suffit à tout
songs.lyrics:
Dis Dieu, suffit à tout au délà de tout
Et rien, ni dans les cieux, ni sur la terre sauf Dieu ne peut suffir
En verité, il est en lui même celui qui sait, le Soutien

l'Omnipotent (x4)
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Mirages
songs.lyrics:
En vérité, je vous le dis, ce monde est semblable à ces mirages du désert que le voyageur assoiffé prend pour de l'eau (x2)

Et que, de tout son pouvoir, il s'efforce d'atteindre, il s'efforce d'atteindre (x2)

Jusqu'au moment où y étant parvenu (x2)

Il s'aperçoit que ce n'était que pure illusion. (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Mon Dieu guide moi
songs.lyrics: Mon Dieu, guide-moi, protège-moi, illumine la lampe de mon cœur et fais de moi une étoile brillante. Tu es le Fort, le Puissant. (x2)\n\n‘Abdu'l-Bahá (x5)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Nous ne pouvons pas séparer
songs.lyrics:
Nous ne pouvons pas séparer le cœur humain de l'environnement qui nous entoure, en disant que quand l'un deux sera transformé, tout ira mieux. (x2)

L'homme fait partie intégrante de la structure organique du monde.
Sa vie intérieure façonne l'environnement
Et elle est elle-même profondément influencée par celui-ci. (x6)

Nous ne pouvons pas séparer le cœur humain de l'environnement qui nous entoure, en disant que quand l'un deux sera transformé, tout ira mieux. (x2)
songs.author: Shoghi Effendi

songs.title: Ô mon ami en parole
songs.lyrics:
Ô mon ami en parole (x2)
Médites un instant. As-tu jamais entendu dire qu'un seul pouvait accueillir à la fois l'ennemi et l'ami?
Chasse donc l'étranger (x2)
Pour que l'ami entre chez lui (x4)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Ô fils de l'homme
songs.lyrics:
Ô fils de l'homme
Sache te contenter de moi
Et ne cherche nul autre pour te secourir (x2)

Car jamais personne en dehors de moi te suffira (x2)

Jamais (x4)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Ô Seigneur tu dissipes toutes les angoisses
songs.lyrics:
Ô Seigneur, tu dissipes toutes les angoisses et chasses toutes les afflictions.
Tu bannis les soucis et libères tous les esclaves, tu es le rédempteur des âmes.

Ô Seigneur, par ta miséricorde, délivre-moi et compte-moi au nombre des serviteurs.
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Plus nous nous cherchons
songs.lyrics:
Plus nous nous cherchons, moins nous avons la chance de nous trouver

Plus nous cherchons Dieu et servons nos semblables plus profondément nous devenons familiarisés

Avec nous-mêmes
Et intérieurement rassurés (x4)

Ceci est l'une des grandes lois spirituelles de la vie (x4)
songs.author: Shoghi Effendi

songs.title: Si l'amour
songs.lyrics:
Créez un lien que rien ne peut secouer
Formez une assemblée que rien ne peut briser
Ayez un esprit qui ne cesse jamais d'acquérir des richesses indestructibles

Si l'amour, si l'amour n'existait pas (x2)
Quelle réalité subsisterait? Quelle réalité? (x2)

C'est le feu de l'amour de Dieu qui rend l'homme supérieur à l'animal
Renforcez cette force supérieure à travers laquelle
Est atteint tout le progrès du monde
Est atteint tout le progrès du monde

Créez un lien que rien ne peut secouer
Formez une assemblée que rien ne peut briser
Ayez un esprit qui ne cesse jamais d'acquérir des richesses indestructibles

Si l'amour, si l'amour n'existait pas (x2)
Quelle réalité subsisterait? Quelle réalité? (x2)

Créez un lien que rien ne peut secouer
Formez une assemblée que rien ne peut briser
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Si tu m'aimes
songs.lyrics:
Si tu m'aimes, renonce a toi même. Si tu cherches mon bon plaisir, ne penses pas au tiens (x2)

Ainsi, ainsi, tu mourras en moi et je vivrais en toi éternellement (x2)

O Fils de l'Homme (x2)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Un jardin de roses
songs.lyrics:
Ô mon Dieu
Donne moi un coeur qui s'illumine
Tel le cristal, à la lumière de ton amour

Accorde moi des pensées
Susceptibles de changer
Ce monde en un jardin de roses

Accorde moi des pensées
Susceptibles de changer
Ce monde en un jardin

En un jardin de roses (x4)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Une fontaine d'eau vive
songs.lyrics:
Ô mon Seigneur
Fais de ma prière
Une fontaine d'eau vive (x2)

Qui me permette de vivre tant que durera ta souveraineté et de te mentionner (x4)

Dans chacun de tes mondes (x4)
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Vous devez
songs.lyrics:
Je désire pour vous la distinction
Les Baha'is doivent se distinguer du reste de l'humanité
Je désire pour vous la distinction
Ce n'est pas une distinction ordinaire que je désire

Ni scientifique, ni commerciale, ni industrielle que je désire (x2)

Je désire pour vous la distinction spirituelle à savoir
Vous devez être éminents et distingués par les mœurs dans l'amour de Dieu, vous devez

Vous devez, vous devez (x4)

Vous devez, vous devez (distingué de tout autre)
Vous devez, vous devez (par l'amour de l'humanité)
Vous devez, vous devez (par l'unité et l'accord)
Vous devez, vous devez (par l'amour et la justice) (x2)

Ni scientifique, ni commerciale, ni industrielle que je désire (x2)

Je désire pour vous la distinction spirituelle à savoir
Vous devez être éminents et distingués par les mœurs dans l'amour de Dieu, vous devez

Vous devez, vous devez (x8)
songs.author: 'Abdu'l-Bahá

songs.title: Oyé oyé
songs.lyrics:
Enaltece nuestra causa para que yo te revele (x2)
Los misterios de mi grandeza y así brilles con mi luz
Los misterios de mi grandeza con la luz de la eternidad

Oyé, oyé el Más Glorioso, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Compasivo, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Incomparable, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Poderoso, o Alláh'u'Abhá

Regocíjate con la alegría, con la alegría de tu corazón (x2)
Y merecerás hallarme y Mi belleza reflejar (x2)
Oyé, oyé el Más Glorioso, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Compasivo, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Incomparable, o Alláh'u'Abhá
Oyé, oyé el Poderoso, o Alláh'u'Abhá
songs.author: Bahá'u'lláh

songs.title: Kodi Palinso Wina
songs.lyrics:
Kodi palinso wina (x2)

Wochotsa masawutso kupatula Mulungu!

Nenani, nenani, nenani (x2)
songs.author: The Báb

songs.title: Rejoice / Toko zani
songs.lyrics:
Rejoice, rejoice
For a new day has dawned
The whole wide world is but one fold

Rejoice, rejoice
For a new day has dawned
The plan of God has now been told

The Promised One by the name of Bahá
Came to bring a new day
Let us be happy, let us say
Ya Bahá'u'l-Abhá
Say Ya Bahá'u'l-Abhá (x2)

 In Zulu:
" Toko zani nina laba wanki
  &nbspLe li langa lakuka na

  &nbspToko zani nina laba wanki
  &nbspLe li langa lakuka na

  &nbspToko lakola luku Bahá
  &nbspUm lama wah lampa
  &nbspKaday kuday si leindole
  &nbspYa Bahá'u'l-Abhá
  &nbspTi Ya Bahá'u'l-Abhá (x2) "
